short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate form filling in Electronic Healthcare Record (EHR) systems with AI using Motics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Revolutionise your clinical documentation process with Motics, the intelligent Chrome extension designed for healthcare professionals. Seamlessly integrate AI-powered assistance into your Electronic Health Record (EHR) system, saving time and improving accuracy in your patient notes.

Key Features:
Smart Context Recognition: Motics understands the context of each EHR field, ensuring relevant and accurate information generation.

Time-Saving: Reduce time spent on documentation, allowing you to focus more on patient care.

Accuracy Improvement: Minimise errors and omissions in your clinical notes with AI-assisted generation.

Flexible Input Options: Choose between using transcripts or AI-generated summaries of your patient encounters as the basis for note generation.

Seamless Integration: Works smoothly with all web-EHR systems, appearing only when you need it. If Motics doesn't appear on your EHR - email hello@motics.co.uk and we'll add it.

Privacy-Focused: Your data security is our priority. Motics operates with strict adherence to healthcare privacy standards.
